# show()

**Instance Method**

Displays the peer picker dialog to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
func show()
```

## Discussion

On iOS 3.1 or later, the peer picker is retained when it is shown, and autoreleased when it is dismissed.

## Displaying the Picker Dialog

- **dismiss()**: Hides the peer picker dialog.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the picker dialog is visible.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the picker dialog is visible.
items.name: isVisible
